page.title: 03DIWALI IN LEICESTER
page.content: The festival of{Diwali}is celebrated by Asians in the Autumn.It is celeb- -rated in different ways by people with different backgrounds.The story behind the festival comes from the Ramayana,a Hindu poem.The story told is one of good overcoming evil. Diwali is the time for homes to be given a clean and decorated with diwas-little lights.Special{rangoli patterns are made on doorsteps.Diwali cards are sent and everyone shares special cakes and sweets.It is a time when children receive presents and parties are held. Diwali comes in the 12th month of the Hindu year.It is known as Aasa or Ashwin (the month of festivals).The theme of Diwali is the conquest of good over evil (Rama over Ravana and Krishna over Naraka;light over darkness).
